name: Charged (Stephen Pearce)
description:
Created for Weekly Game Jam 205 - "Unconventional Superpowers".

Your unconventional superpower is one of static charges. Beyond the platforming basics, you will use your charge to pick up and move objects. You can climb on them, fire them towards enemies and so on.

Controls

Use the SPACE key to start and flip charge. Use the ARROW KEYS to move and

While the in-game instructions assume keyboard use, the game also supports modern Xbox controllers with the analogue stick for movement and fire buttons handling changes of polarity and jumping.

Credits

This work benefits from the commons.

  • The text was created (or is otherwise real-time rendered) using the fonts Kenney Mini and Kenney Mini Square. The Kenney Fonts set is marked with CC0 1.0.
  • The pretty gradient skybox is made possible thanks to Alex Strook's free gradient shader. 
  • The background music track was sourced from Open Game Art. It is the track Venus by SketchyLogic. It has been marked CC0 1.0.

Thanks

Thanks again to everybody who has played and commented on my previous jam games. I overextended myself a bit this week, and as such the submission is late. I'll write about it on my website shortly.
